wikipedia_page.main: Georgina Callaghan is a British singer-songwriter. She performs under the name Callaghan. She is best known for her 2012 album Life in Full Colour produced by Shawn Mullins.

response: * Georgina Callaghan (born 1986) singer-songwriter,IMDb Database retrieved 19 January 2018 currently lives in Nashville
